name: SCHLORP
description:
SCHLORP is a GMTK Game Jam 2021 submission created, the theme of which was "Joined Together". In this game you are a slime with a grapple hook, which you can use to join with your enemies and use their powers.

Use the arrow keys to move and aim, space to jump, and shift to fire your grappling hook or use your ability.

Created by:

  • Cole Granof github
  • Joe Petitti website
  • Kent Libby github
  • Matt Puentes website
  • Ben Aubi twitter

Check it out on GitHub!
